TEXT.TITLE: SYRIA SEEKING WHITE SUGAR NEXT MONTH - TRADE
TEXT.BODY: Syria is holding a buying tender on May 6, for reply the next day, for 24,000 tonnes white sugar for shipment in two equal parts in June and July, traders said. Reuter
